channel.description: Recent content in business on NewsStreet | News portal

item.title: Oil Tanker Market In Disarray As EU Ban On Russian Crude Nears
item.description: Oil Tanker Market In Disarray As EU Ban On Russian Crude Nears Six weeks before the EU embargo on Russian crude oil exports and the planned price cap on Russian oil enters into force, the global tanker and oil markets face increased uncertainty over who will ship Russia’s oil—and how—as of December 5.

item.title: Rishi Sunak Is A New And Old-Fashioned Tory
item.description: Rishi Sunak Is A New And Old-Fashioned Tory The next UK prime minister is a fascinating mix of the new and the old in the world of the ruling Conservative Party.

item.title: Gold Price on Diwali: Check 22-carat yellow metal rate before buying today
item.description: Gold Price on Diwali: Check 22-carat yellow metal rate before buying today Prices for 24-carat gold in the national capital Delhi increased to Rs 50,510 per 10 grams while 22-carat gold or ornamental gold was priced at Rs 48,100 per ten grams.

item.title: German Gas Giant Makes Headquarters Smaller And Colder To Save Energy
item.description: German Gas Giant Makes Headquarters Smaller And Colder To Save Energy Germany’s gas major Uniper will reduce the use of office space at its headquarters by half and maintain lower temperatures in the space remaining in use, German media reported, as quoted by Reuters.

item.title: Hong Kong Presents Digital Currency Prototype, Project Aurum
item.description: Hong Kong Presents Digital Currency Prototype, Project Aurum Financial authorities in Hong Kong have unveiled a prototype of the Chinese autonomous territory’s own central bank digital currency called Project Aurum.

item.title: Sunak Edges Closer to UK Leadership Prize As Johnson Caves
item.description: Sunak Edges Closer to UK Leadership Prize As Johnson Caves Boris Johnson pulled out of the race to lead the UK’s ruling Conservative Party and the nation, ending a bid to replace Liz Truss as prime minister.

item.title: Diwali 2022: MASSIVE crowd witnessed at Anand Vihar bus stand and metro stations due to festivities
item.description: Diwali 2022: MASSIVE crowd witnessed at Anand Vihar bus stand and metro stations due to festivities Diwali 2022: Heavy crowd gathered at Anand Vihar bus stand and metro station to travel home ahead of festivities, reports ANI.
